page.title: 17My journey to school
page.content: Most of the children of my age who live in this area go to Holinhey C.P.School.We all have to find our way to school ourselves as there are no school buses.Some of us come to school on the local bus when the weather is bad but there are not many of these and they dont run at the right times.Some of my friends are brought to school by car but I walk to school like most of my friends, some of whom walk nearly two miles each way.I walk to school from Lyme Green along Robin Lane,Walker Lane into Tunnicliffe and Bell Avenue.Some of my friends who live on the estate or in Langley are helped across the Lane Ends Junction which can be busy and dangerous.My walk to and from school is not very well lighted and in November until March we often walk in groups to be safer.
